title: Thiago Motta - Wikipedia
snippet: During his debut campaign he performed consistently well and was a regular in the starting eleven, under coach Gian Piero Gasperini. On 11 April 2009, Motta scored two goals (one of them in the first half's injury time) in a final 3â€“2 home victory over Juventus.

title: Juventus sack head coach Thiago Motta, replaced by Igor Tudor - The Athletic
snippet: Igor Tudor is the new Head Coach of the Menâ€™s First Team. Welcome, Igor! Juventus thanks Thiago Motta for his work, passion and dedication during his time with the club.

title: Juventus sack coach Motta and appoint Tudor | beIN SPORTS
snippet: Juventus have made a change in the dugout after slipping out of Serie A's top four, with Igor Tudor replacing Thiago Motta.

title: Juventus sack manager Thiago Motta and announce Igor Tudor as new coach until the end of the season - CBS Sports

title: Thiago Motta: What went wrong at Juventus for ex-Bologna boss? - BBC Sport
snippet: Thiago Motta lasted just nine months at Juventus before the Italian giants sacked him last week and swiftly appointed Igor Tudor.
